plot: Deborah Laymon prayed that life would normalize once her husband, Chris, returned home from a tour of duty in combat. To her horror, she discovers that some things aren't as they seem and others will never be the same again.
title: The House That Wept Blood
plot_es: Deborah Laymon prayed that life would normalize once her husband, Chris, returned home from a tour of duty in combat. To her horror, she discovers that some things aren't as they seem and others will never be the same again.
plot_en: Deborah Laymon prayed that life would normalize once her husband, Chris, returned home from a tour of duty in combat. To her horror, she discovers that some things aren't as they seem and others will never be the same again.
